Paragraphs

This is the default paragraph style. Note how lovely this text is. I handcrafted it just for you! Now let's see how it looks with emphasis. That's just so emphatic. This text can be pretty strong, too. You can even combine strength and emphasis (and vice versa).

Now what would a proper paragraph on the web be without a link to something else?

Here is some more paragraph text in a different column!

Notice how all the lines are lined-up, even when paragraphs break at different points. That is by design!

Grids

Our grids are simple and use flexbox. Below are some boxes placed inside grid containers.

This is a container row. It has two children automatically filling the available area. On mobile, they stack.

This is a container row. It has three children automatically filling the available area. On mobile, they stack.

This is a container row. It has four children automatically filling the available area. On mobile, they stack.

This column sizes automatically.

This column will always be one-third width on tablets using the .tablet-column-33 class. On desktops, it will be 25% with the desktop-column-25 class.

This column will always be one-third width on tablets and bigger screens using the .tablet-column-33 class.

This column will always be one-third width on tablets and bigger screens using the .tablet-column-33 class.

This column will always be one-third width on tablets and bigger screens using the .tablet-column-33 class.
